if somebody in that team would have said,

three billion plus people who

is not a 15-year-old boy
in a basement.

Now the average age of a

Like, I mean, people don't

And I wanted to make sure that we create,
as we went down this path,

I wanted to make sure

metaverse, like we build core technology.
